alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 09 at 8:25PM CDT until August 15 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi .Minor flooding continues on the Little Wabash River at Carmi. The river is now forecast to crest near 29.9 feet Wednesday morning, then fall below flood stage Monday. For the Little Wabash River...including Carmi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 29.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.9 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CDT.
